NG0408:1: khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du //
NG0408:2: sbas pas bam gyi kha bzhin no //
NG0408:3: thams cad la yang me long bzhin //
NG0408:4: bltas kyang gzugs brnyan snang mi 'gyur //
NG0408:5: ye shes 'phrul gyi gsang tshig ni //
NG0408:7: yid bzhin rin chen lhun gyis grub //
NG0408:9: de nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
NG0408:10: nga yi ston pa rnams kyis //
NG0408:11: bstan pa yongs su rgyas bya'i phyir //
NG0408:12: 'bras bu lnga lnga tha mar brgyad //
NG0408:13: dam bcas tshul las 'da' ma byed /
NG0408:14: khyad par gter sgo srung byed pa //
NG0408:15: bka' yi ral can e ka ti //
NG0408:17: theg pa thams cad kyi yang rtse /
NG0408:20: man ngag thams cad kyi rtsa ba /
NG0408:22: kha sa man ta nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las //
NG0408:23: kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gsungs pa ste le'u
NG0408:24: drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o // // ma ha a
NG0408:25: ti yo ga g+hu h+ya pra de sha kha sa
NG0408:26: man ta nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud rdzogs
NG0408:27: so /// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal seng ge'i 'od can gyi zhal snga nas dang */
NG0408:28: zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong gan 'jags snam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gzigs pa des /
